tickets.title: Day Ski Pass
tickets.shortDescription: Full-day access to all ski lifts.
tickets.detailledDescription: Enjoy unlimited skiing across the entire resort for one full day. Perfect for casual and experienced skiers alike.

tickets.title: Half-Day Ski Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: A flexible ticket for spending the afternoon on the slopes. Valid from 12:00 until closing.

tickets.title: Night Skiing Ticket
tickets.detailledDescription: Experience the mountain in a unique way with illuminated evening slopes, available on selected nights.

tickets.title: Snowboard Park Access
tickets.detailledDescription: Unlimited access to all snowboard jumps, rails, and freestyle training zones.

tickets.title: Weekend Ski Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Ski all weekend long with this two-day pass for all lifts and slopes.

tickets.title: Family Ski Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Includes lift access for two adults and up to two children. Additional children can be added at reduced cost.

tickets.title: Beginner Area Ticket
tickets.detailledDescription: Designed for first-time skiers and learners, giving access to easy slopes and training lifts.

tickets.title: Cross-Country Trail Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Explore groomed cross-country skiing trails suited for both skating and classic technique.

tickets.title: Ski Touring Permit
tickets.detailledDescription: Required for ski touring activities within marked touring zones. Includes safety information.

tickets.title: Season Ski Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Enjoy the resort throughout the entire winter season with unrestricted lift access.

tickets.title: 5-Day Flex Ticket
tickets.shortDescription: 5 days of skiing within a month.
tickets.detailledDescription: Ski any five days within the same month. Days do not have to be consecutive.

tickets.title: Sledding Track Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Unlimited rides on our popular sledding track. Helmets recommended.

tickets.title: Snowshoe Trail Access
tickets.detailledDescription: Explore the beautiful snow-covered landscapes on curated snowshoe routes.

tickets.title: Ice Skating Rink Entry
tickets.detailledDescription: Enjoy a relaxing day on the ice with access to the entire rink area.

tickets.title: Snow Park Pro Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: For experienced freestyle skiers and snowboarders. Includes access to large jumps and expert rails.

tickets.title: Mountain View Lift Ride
tickets.detailledDescription: Perfect for non-skiers: take the lift to the panoramic viewpoint and enjoy stunning alpine scenery.

tickets.title: Beginner Lesson Ticket
tickets.detailledDescription: Includes beginner area access plus a guided introduction lesson with a ski instructor.

tickets.title: Group Discount Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Special pricing for large groups, including priority lift access.

tickets.title: Kids Snow Fun Ticket
tickets.detailledDescription: Includes snow playground, mini-lifts, and beginner training slopes for children.

tickets.title: Snowbike Access Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Access to designated snowbike areas. Requires safety training verification.

tickets.title: Freeride Zone Permit
tickets.detailledDescription: Required for freeride zones. Includes avalanche safety briefing at check-in.

tickets.title: Winter Hiking Ticket
tickets.detailledDescription: Gives access to all marked winter hiking routes in the resort area.

tickets.title: VIP Lounge Access
tickets.detailledDescription: Includes hot drinks, lounge seating, and charging stations at the summit lounge.

tickets.title: Equipment Storage Ticket
tickets.detailledDescription: Secure storage for your equipment for one day. Heated lockers available.

tickets.title: Tubing Track Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Unlimited tubing rides for the day. Great for families and groups.

tickets.title: Full Equipment Rental Ticket
tickets.detailledDescription: Includes boots, skis/snowboard, poles, and helmet rental for one full day.

tickets.title: Advanced Lesson Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Improve your skiing or snowboarding skills with a certified instructor.

tickets.title: Multi-Resort Pass
tickets.detailledDescription: Ski across multiple resorts with this combined access ticket, valid for the whole week.

tickets.title: Snowmobile Experience
tickets.detailledDescription: Join a thrilling guided tour through snowy terrains. Safety training included.

tickets.title: Sunset Panorama Ticket
tickets.detailledDescription: Catch the most beautiful mountain sunset from our dedicated vista plateau.
